page.title: 01COMMUNICATIONS-THE PO
page.content: {THE POST OFFICE IN BISHOPS STORTFORD { The post office workers get about Â£101 per week. They collect letters from about 35 post boxes in Stortford. About 20,000 letters go through the P.O. in one day.Postmen have to be up at about 5 am to get to the post office early to sort the mail. One postman can deliver letters in up to six streets. They finish work at lunchtime and only have Sundays off. To be a postman you have to be fit because you get lots of exercise. He hates his job in the ice and snow because he gets very cold. One lady had been working for the post office for 19 years.Most postmen enjoy the open air as they deliver letters on a bike. A postman called Brian was attacked by a dog when he was delivering a letter.
